name: The Bonzi Buddy RPG
description:
WARNING!!! RPG VX ACE RTP IS REQUIRED TO DOWNLOAD!

For the very first time, the world's favourite purple gorilla goes out on a huge adventure!

On this crazy and unfiltered RPG, Bonzi Buddy:

  • Travels over 5 different worlds!
  • Forms a friendship with a incredible cast of characters, featuring the likes of Chris Chandler, Matt Watson and Doug Walker!
  • Equips an arsenal of over 50 weapons, fully animated in combat!
  • Battles well over 40 different foes!
  • Takes on tough arenas that feature free-play and amazing rewards!
  • Humongous bosses that will surely shiver your timbers!
  • Puts up with a rather immature story full of whacky unexpected shenanigans!
  • Listens to a handful of beautiful eargasmic songs! (Licensed songs were converted to MIDI format for obvious reasons)

But even with all this AMAZING information at our disposal, what exactly is Bonzi's purpose? Well, you'll have to find out!

Warning: This game is intended for mature audiences, as it features heavy swearing, drug usage, blood and violence.

This game has several moments sensitive to epileptic users. If you have epilepsy, play at your own risk.
